title: From the c.1951 movie "Scrooge - A Christmas Carol"
content:
Take a look at the "M" in particular. It could be a custom hand-lettered sign.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [jemos.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20121026040341/http:/typophile.com/files/jemos.jpg) | 36.87 KB |
author: michael-g

comments.content: It is _most probably_ a custom hand-lettered sign. :^)
I'd agree with Yves. You might find something similar at [http://www.letterheadfonts.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20121026040341/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/ "http://www.letterheadfonts.com/")
